SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.queue

Interface QueueDatabase<T extends Serializable>

Type Parameters:
T - Type of items stored in the queue, must be Serializable
All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Closeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryQueueDatabase, MapDBQueueDatabase, QueueMariaDB, QueuePgSQL, RedisQueueDatabase, SQLQueueDatabase
public interface QueueDatabase<T extends Serializable> extends Closeable
Interface for queue database implementations.

Defines the contract for persistent queue storage backends.

    • enqueue

      void enqueue(T item)
      Add an item to the tail of the queue.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to enqueue

    • dequeue

      T dequeue()
      Remove and return the head of the queue, or null if empty.
      Returns:
      The head item or null if empty

    • peek

      T peek()
      Peek at the head without removing.
      Returns:
      The head item or null if empty

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Check if the queue is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the queue is empty

    • size

      long size()
      Get the size of the queue.
      Returns:
      The number of items in the queue

    • snapshot

      List<T> snapshot()
      Take a snapshot copy of current values for read-only inspection.
      Returns:
      List of all items in the queue

    • removeByIndex

      boolean removeByIndex(int index)
      Remove an item from the queue by index (0-based).
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the item to remove
      Returns:
      true if item was removed, false if index was out of bounds

    • removeByIndices

      int removeByIndices(List<Integer> indices)
      Remove items from the queue by indices (0-based).
      Parameters:
      indices - The indices of items to remove
      Returns:
      Number of items successfully removed

    • removeByUID

      boolean removeByUID(String uid)
      Remove an item from the queue by UID (for RelaySession).
      Parameters:
      uid - The UID of the item to remove
      Returns:
      true if item was removed, false if not found

    • removeByUIDs

      int removeByUIDs(List<String> uids)
      Remove items from the queue by UIDs (for RelaySession).
      Parameters:
      uids - The UIDs of items to remove
      Returns:
      Number of items successfully removed

      void clear()
      Clear all items from the queue.

    • initialize

      void initialize()
      Initialize the database connection/resources. Called during queue creation.
